1.punchline: How do blind people know when they’re done wiping there ass?

2.punchline: What do you call a disabled Asian? Sum Ting Wong

3.punchline: Do midgets still start their childhood stories off with, “When I was little”?

4.punchline:
Q. What caused the death of Captain Hook? 
A. He accidentally use the wrong hand wiping his ass,

5.punchline: If someone is deaf what language does the voice in their head speak?

6.punchline: Just decided to run a marathon for charity. At first I didn’t want to do it but apparently it’s for blind and disabled kids so I think I’ve got a good chance of winning.

7.punchline: A blind woman told me I had a big penis yesterday. I think she was pulling my leg.

8.punchline: I used to have a relationship with a blind girl which was rewarding but really challenging. It took me ages to learn how to copy her husband’s voice.

9.punchline: Whoever persuaded blind people they need to wear sunglasses must have been one hell of a salesman.

10.punchline:
Q:Whats the best part of having Alzheimer’s? 
A:You can hide your own easter eggs.

11.punchline: Can’t believe how ungrateful my dwarf next door neighbor is. I saw him waiting at the bus stop earlier today and offered to give him a lift but he told me to “f*ck off”. In the end I decided to just close my rucksack and walk away.

12.punchline: Just recently finished a jigsaw puzzle in only 5 months, the box said 2-4 years.

13.punchline: Just recently finished a jigsaw puzzle in only 5 months, the box said 2-4 years.

14.punchline: Why do anorexics love KFC? Because it comes with a bucket.

15.punchline: Just been told by my psychiatrist that i’m bipolar. Don’t know whether to laugh or cry.

16.punchline: A traffic warden tried to give me a ticket today for parking in a disabled space.  I said “Why don’t you go f*ck yourself you c*nt, I’ve got Tourettes”.

17.punchline: I really can’t stand being in a wheelchair.

18.punchline: A dyslexic man walks into a bra.

19.punchline: After a year of being really ill and having multiple hospital trips the doctor finally gave me some good news. I’m going to have a disease named after me.

20.punchline: If I had parkinson’s disease, I’d glue my hand to my cock!

21.punchline: What are the only 2 electrical devices you should always leave on overnight? Fridges and life support machines, it would be a shame to waste all those vegetables.

22.punchline: When a deaf person sees someone yawn do they think it’s a scream?

23.punchline: Who cleans up after guide dogs?

24.punchline: A blind man walks into a bar… then a table… then finally a chair.

25.punchline: Why is it called Alcoholics Anonymous when the first thing you do is stand up and say, ‘My name is Peter and I am an alcoholic’?

26.punchline: I can‘t believe how uncaring some people are. I‘m trying to raise money for charity but every time I ask someone if they can spare some money to help spastics they look at me in disgust.

27.punchline: Did you hear about that museum in Ireland? They made an electrified, ‘Do Not Touch’ sign so blind people would get the message as well.

28.punchline: Doctors can have a cruel sense of humor sometimes. Went to see the doctor about my hair becoming thin and he told me I have HIV… Hair Is Vanishing.

29.punchline: Just been diagnosed with diabetes. I’m beginning to have doubts about Dr Pepper’s medical qualifications.

30.punchline: Once you get past a certain age “getting lucky” is the thing that happens when your remember where you put down your keys.

31.punchline: Why do deaf people make the best gynecologists? Because they’re good at reading lips.

32.punchline: What do you call a guy who can swim without using his arms and legs? Clever dick.

33.punchline: I’m proud to say I donated over $10 million to disabled gymnasts in Eastern Europe last year. Apparently they contacted my bank to let me know that ‘the invalid Czechs were bouncing’ which is great news.

34.punchline:
Q. What did the dwarf say when he saw a prostitute? 
A. Hi hoe

35.punchline:
Did you hear about the blind gynecologist? 
He could read lips.

36.punchline: I hate being bipolar, it’s amazing.

37.punchline: I can count the number of times I’ve been to Chernobyl on one hand….. It’s 7.

38.punchline: My midget landlord told me that he wants me to leave my house by tommorow night. That‘s short notice.

39.punchline: What’s the fastest thing in the sea? Stevie Wonder’s Ferrari.

40.punchline:
Q. How many blind people does it take to screw in a light bulb? 
A. None, they don’t need light bulbs.

41.punchline:
What do you call an epileptic in a bush? 
Russell.

42.punchline: When you’re a midget shorts don’t exist, only trousers and super long legged trousers.

43.punchline:
The following coversation took place at a hosiptal in Alabama. Patient: Doctor doctor, I‘ve got Aids, do you have a cure? 
doctor: Go home and eat all the food in your kitchen. 
Patient: will that cure my aids? 
doctor: no but it will show you what your arse is used for

44.punchline: When you’re a midget shorts don’t exist, only trousers and super long legged trousers.

45.punchline: My autistic brother recently got arrested after his first day at work as a taxi driver. I should never have told him to “knock em dead”.

46.punchline: Disabled toilets. Ironically, the only toilets that are big enough to run around in.

47.punchline: I first discovered I was dyslexic when I went to an Abba themed party dressed like an Arab.

48.punchline: Cant believed how kinky the hotel is where I’m staying. Apparently the porn is disabled.

49.punchline:
Have you heard about those new mobile phones for deaf people? 
They’re called ‘eye-phones’.

50.punchline: Q. Why do crippled people get bullied? A. Because they can’t stand up for them selves.

51.punchline:
Whats black and screams?? 
Jordans son harvey answering the iron

53.punchline: My doctor told me today that I shouldn’t drink alcohol every day. “That’s fine”, I said, I only drink at night anyway.

54.punchline: Most of the time a problem shared is a problem halved unless the problem happens to be Aids.

55.punchline: I went to see my psychiatrist today to tell him I’ve been hearing voices. He told me he wasn’t a psychiatrist and then he ran away.

56.punchline: Most of the time a problem shared is a problem halved unless the problem happens to be Aids.

57.punchline: In my spare time I like to help blind people… I’m great with a slingshot.

58.punchline: Q: Why did the man with one hand cross the road? A: To get to the second hand shop.

59.punchline: I think dyslexic people should form an onion.

60.punchline: Why does your gynaecologist leave the room when you get undressed?

61.punchline: I think dyslexic people should form an onion.

62.punchline:
Q. Why did Amy fall off the swing? 
A. because she had no arms Knock Knock 
Who’s there 
Not Amy

63.punchline: A lady with a clipboard stopped me in the street the other day. She said, ‘Can you spare a few minutes for cancer research?’ I said, ‘All right, but we won’t get much done.

64.punchline:
What do you call a leper in a bath? 
Soup

65.punchline: If laughter is the best medicine then does that mean it’s OK to laugh at people in wheelchairs?

66.punchline: A scientific survey has recently found that 6/7 dwarfs aren’t happy.

67.punchline: Q. Why can’t dyslexics smell gas?  A, Because they are poor smellers and often can’t even smell their own name.

68.punchline: All my of my 15 psychiatrists say that I have an addictive persolality.

69.punchline: Just because I’m dyslexic doesn’t mean I don’t layve you.

70.punchline: “You have diabetes,“ the doctor said sweetly.

71.punchline: Just started the new sensible eating diet. I’ve now stopped eating my meals using a soap-dish and a pair of scissors.

72.punchline:
What’s green and melts in your mouth? 
A leper’s c*ck.

73.punchline: How many blind people does it take to change a light bulb ? Zero, they don’t bother doing it.

74.punchline:
First rule of Alzheimer’s Club… 
Don’t talk about chess club.

75.punchline: How does Bruce Buffer introduce the Special Olympics? “LLLLLLLLet’s get rrrrrrrready to STUMBLLLLE!!!

76.punchline: If life gives you melons, you’re probably dyslexic.

77.punchline: When I first found out I had a tumor I was horrified but now it’s starting to grow on me.

78.punchline: Caught my dyslexic housemate putting shoe polish on his genitals the other day. I later found out it happened after he read a newspaper article about the clocks going back.

79.punchline: You can say whatever you want about deaf people.

80.punchline: Did you hear about the dyslexic devil worshiper? Apparently he sacrificed his pet chicken to Santa.

81.punchline: I first met my wife at the London 2012 Special Olympics, it was a no brainier.

82.punchline:
Q. Why do deaf women wear tight jeans? 
A. So you can read their lips.

83.punchline:
What did the guy with Leprosy say to the whore after they made love? 
Keep the tip. (meaning the tip of his p*nis)

84.punchline:
The following conversation took place while a hemophiliac was shopping.  Shop Assistant: Can I help you sir? 
Hemophiliac: No thanks, I’m just bruising.

85.punchline: Can’t believe how arrogant Stephen Hawking is. Got a message saying he needed a new wheelchair but every time I call him to arrange delivery it just goes through to his answerphone.

86.punchline: A blind man walks into a bar.

87.punchline:
Why do deaf people watch TV late at night? 
Because they can’t hear their alarm go off in the morning.

88.punchline:
Q. What’s the difference between Aids and cancer? 
A. When you have cancer you get more visitors.

89.punchline: My doctor told me last week that I don’t eat enough vegetables so I’ve now started dating a girl who has down syndrome.
